```{r}
rm(list=ls())
library(readxl)
library(rstatix)
library(stats)
data<-read_excel("hw10_data.xlsx")
data$remote[data$remote=="no"]=0
data$remote[data$remote=="yes"]=1
data$remote=as.numeric(data$remote)
plot(hours,stress)
shapiro_test(hours)
shapiro_test(stress)
cor.test(hours,stress,method="pearson")
cor.test(hours,stress,method="spearman")
cor.test(data$remote,stress,method="pearson")
t.test(data$stress[data$remote=="0"],data$stress[data$remote=="1"])
cor.test(hours[data$remote=="0"],stress[data$remote=="0"],method="pearson")
cor.test(hours[data$remote=="1"],stress[data$remote=="1"],method="pearson")
```
